name: ical-generator
description: ical-generator is a small piece of code which generates ical calendar files
author: Sebastian Pekarek <mail@sebbo.net>

scripts.all: npm run check && npm run visualize && npm run tests && npm run build
scripts.tests: npm run test && npm run coverage
scripts.bump:reset: export MODULEVERSION=$(npm view ical-generator version) && npm run bump:reset:save
scripts.bump:reset:next: export MODULEVERSION=$(npm view ical-generator@next version) && npm run bump:reset:save
scripts.bump:develop: npm run bump:reset:next && npm --no-git-tag-version version prerelease
scripts.bump:production: npm run bump:reset && npm --no-git-tag-version version from-git
